entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:31 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
